name: blockscraper
description:
This game has no win state 

when in the main game use:

[B] to toggle and close building mode

[T] to change block to build with

you can use [WASD] + [QEF] or the mouse to move the camera

teleporters need to be built in couples to work, building blocks and roofs are not walkable, while roads are.

I hope you enjoi playing it as much as I enjoied making it. :)
